(OOC: logo, just to let you know, bat's are not blind. Fruit bats don't use=
 ecolocation to find fruit. It's kind pointless to try and use movement to =
find something that doesn't move. So they see better then humans. Sorry to =
seem like I'm yelling, but I hate when people insult bats, sharks, and othe=
r creatures like that.)

::Magmatron::

    He was watching on his video sc=
reens as Bobertron and Pantron left the base to attack the Pred base. 
    =
"Magmatron, Transform," He said. He then folded his wings over his body lik=
e a cloak. (Like BM Megatron, but without the helmet and extra arms. Also M=
agmatron's wings are solid, not torn strips like Megs) He walked around the=
 room trying to decide what to do. Then he got a paing of pain. His enterna=
l systems knew what it was and told him instantly.
    "Magmatron, Beast Mo=
de," He transformed and took off towards the ocean. Upon reaching the water=
s he took a dive. The salt water repelinished his systems. He went into Rob=
ot mode and walked out of the water.
    "Hmm...it seems I don't run on ene=
rgon anymore," He said to himself. "Well, I will need to be near an ocean i=
f I am to stay online. But the base isn't near one. It will have to move."
=
(It doesn't have thrusters, and is still somewhat stuck in the rock. He's g=
oing to create a landslide to move it.)
